1370: Marcilius moved to Muurhuysen2.D.8 after marriage.
Got married to Volcwiif at age 31 in 1370.
Had a son with Volcwiif, Godefridus, at age 31.
1374: Had a son with Volcwiif, Paradanus, at age 35.
1375: Had a son with Volcwiif, Mewekinus, at age 36.
1378: Had a son with Volcwiif, Cesarius, at age 39.
1379: Lost son Cesarius when Cesarius was 2 years old.
1382: Had a son with Volcwiif, Dieuel, at age 43.
1383: Had a daughter with Volcwiif, Segherarden, at age 44.
Lost son Dieuel when Dieuel was 2 years old.
1384: Had a son with Volcwiif, Jiusippus, at age 45.
